Katra Home

Katra

31 October 2013

Katra is now ready to play with it's first game, the the game Katra was created for - StarTrek

So, set your caps lock for stun (these old programs expected all upper case input!), and Beam me up... 

REM  Extracted from HP tape image 16-Nov-2003 by Pete Turnbull
1  REM ****  HP BASIC PROGRAM LIBRARY  ******************************
2  REM
3  REM       STTR1: STAR TREK
4  REM
5  REM       36243  REV B  --  10/73
6  REM
7  REM ****  CONTRIBUTED PROGRAM  ***********************************
100  REM *****************************************************************
110  REM ***                                                           ***
120  REM ***     STAR TREK: BY MIKE MAYFIELD, CENTERLINE ENGINEERING   ***
130  REM ***                                                           ***
140  REM ***        TOTAL INTERACTION GAME - ORIG. 20 OCT 1972
150  REM ***                                                           ***
160  REM *****************************************************************
Bwa-ha-ha-ha ~ Happy Halloween!
